conclusion: A enters from the lower right corner and interacts with the cubes based on power, collision, and deflection effects.
The image shows a green background with six cubes of different colors (red, green, yellow, blue, purple, orange) and a car labeled A entering from the lower right corner.
A moves left and collides with the red cube.
The red cube is pushed left and collides with the green cube.
The red and green cubes both slide left and stop.
The car continues left and collides with the yellow cube.
The yellow cube slides left and collides with the blue cube and purple cube.
A stops behind the yellow cube.
